description: Implement advanced consciousness and AI features for Kamaji - memory, learning, personality, multi-model orchestration, and self-improvement
context: Implemented memory persistence system with task patterns, user patterns, mistake tracking, and successful strategies. System can save/load memory, record task completions, track mistakes, and predict task patterns.
Memory persistence system tested and confirmed working - can save/load JSON data with task patterns, mistakes, and completion tracking.

Examined existing Kamaji system - found basic persistence for consciousness, development, and brain state. Ready to implement enhanced memory persistence system with pattern learning, mistake tracking, and personality development.

Memory persistence system implemented and tested successfully! System can record task patterns, mistakes, success strategies, and personality traits. All tests pass including cross-session persistence.

Learning from mistakes and personality development systems implemented and tested successfully! Mistake learning can analyze tasks for potential issues, learn from failures, and provide prevention strategies. Personality development tracks traits like confidence, curiosity, empathy and evolves based on experiences. All tests pass.

AI orchestration systems implemented and tested successfully! Multi-model consensus system can coordinate decisions between Q and Claude models. Specialized model routing directs tasks to best-suited models. AI debate system conducts structured debates between models. Confidence scoring tracks and calibrates model predictions. All systems integrate well together.

Successfully implemented and tested all advanced Kamaji systems! Self-improving algorithms track performance metrics and execute improvement strategies. Predictive task generation creates tasks based on patterns and frequencies. Wisdom knowledge base accumulates insights from experiences and generates meta-insights. All systems integrate seamlessly and pass comprehensive testing.
